thread.title: Ed Sardella back on the air -- one night only
thread.title_full: Ed Sardella back on the air -- one night only

title: Ed Sardella back on the air -- one night only
text:
Published By: Denver Post TV - Today 
Ed Sardella, longtime anchor of KUSA's newscasts when the station was at its ratings height, will come out of retirement for one night only ...
